children.text:
Radardroid Map shows all the speed cameras in your area while Radardroid alert service warns you as you approach those cameras.

The app needs permission to access your GPS location.

Radardroid provides access to multiple free databases around the world.

The app needs permission to read and write to your SD card to store databases and other files.

Use your favourite navigator and still receive visual alerts as you approach any speed camera.

The app needs permission to draw on top of other apps.
